about.title: About Me
about.line_1: I'm from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I dream with travel around the world and improve people's lives through technology.
about.line_2: I enjoy learning and teaching useful information in my area of expertise in pursuit teamwork, contributing with ideas üí°, solutions üí™ and goods vibes ‚ö°Ô∏è
about.line_3: Recently I led the development of an application similar to an Ecommerce. Like Fullstack Developer I take part working at both, Backend and Frontend, and organizing and focusing the team to reach our goals using the agile methodology SCRUM.
about.line_4: If you want to know me further, you

s&k.title: Skills & Knowledges
s&k.cardText_1: Experience with Sequelize an Non-Sequelize databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDb
s&k.cardText_2: Knowledges and practices with Node.js and Express, working with tools like Nodemailer and Cloudinary
